channel.title: CVE Feed for MicroDicom -- DICOM Viewer
channel.description: The latest CVEs for MicroDicom -- DICOM Viewer

item.title: CVE-2024-25578|2024-03-01T00:40:00.677Z -- microdicom -- dicom%20viewer
item.description: MicroDicom DICOM Viewer versions 2023.3 (Build 9342) and prior contain a lack of proper validation of user-supplied data, which could result in memory corruption within the application.
